summary: Comprehensive UI testing of two P1 features: 1) Tier-based Grouping in Domain List - tier accordions (LP/Money Site, Tier 1, Tier 2), collapse/expand, Grouped/Flat toggle all working. 2) Change History Timeline - filters panel with User/Action/Node/Date fields, Apply/Clear buttons. Change Details sheet displays human-readable labels (Role: Supporting vs Main (LP/Money Site), Status: Canonical vs Primary Target, Target: domain name instead of ObjectID). View Node in Graph button successfully highlights node.

tier_grouping_feature: Domain List tab displays tier-grouped view by default
Grouped/Flat view toggle buttons present and working (data-testid: grouped-view-btn, flat-view-btn)
Tier 0 (LP/Money Site) header displays with correct count: 1 node
Tier 1 header displays with correct count: 3 nodes
Tier 2 header displays with correct count: 1 node
Accordion collapse/expand functionality working - click tier header to toggle
Tier legend shows LP, T1, T2, T3, T4+ color indicators
Flat view displays table with all columns: Domain, Tier, Role, Status, Index, Target, Ranking, Actions
change_history_feature: Change History tab opens correctly (data-testid: history-tab)
Change history table displays with columns: Date, User, Domain/Path, Action, Note, Details
Filters button toggles filter panel open/closed
Filter fields present: User (Email input), Action (dropdown), Node (domain/path input), From Date (date picker)
Action dropdown includes: All Actions, Created, Updated, Deleted, Relinked, Role Changed, Path Changed
Change log rows clickable to open Change Details sheet
change_details_sheet: Change Details sheet opens with correct title and action badge (Role Changed)
Affected Node shows domain name (moneysite.com) - NOT ObjectID
Change Note section shows descriptive change note
BEFORE section shows: Role: Supporting, Status: Canonical, Index: INDEX, Target: tier1-site1.com
AFTER section shows: Role: Main (LP/Money Site), Status: Primary Target, Index: INDEX
Target field shows domain name (tier1-site1.com) - NOT ObjectID
view_node_in_graph: View Node in Graph button present (data-testid: view-node-graph-btn)
Button click navigates to Visual Graph tab
Toast message 'Node highlighted in graph' displayed
Network graph visible with highlighted node

critical_code_review_comments: Minor: Console warnings about Missing Description for DialogContent - accessibility improvement recommended
Tier grouping correctly implemented in GroupDetailPage.jsx with tierGroups useMemo (line 215) and collapsedTiers state (line 251)
Change history filters working via loadChangeHistory function with params object
Human-readable labels enriched via backend enrich_snapshot function in v3_router.py (line 3346)
seed_data_creation: Used existing TESTER2 network with existing change history from previous Main Switch testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Both P1 features fully tested and working: 1) Tier-based Grouping - LP/Money Site, Tier 1, Tier 2 accordions with node counts, collapsible headers, Grouped/Flat toggle. 2) Change History Timeline - filters panel (User, Action, Node, Date), Change Details sheet with human-readable diffs showing Role (Supporting vs Main), Status (Canonical vs Primary Target), Target (domain names not ObjectIDs). View Node in Graph button highlights node and switches to Visual Graph tab. All data-testid attributes present for automated testing.
